name: Cardiology
description: Cardiology is the study and treatment of disorders of the heart and the blood vessels. A person with heart disease or cardiovascular disease may be referred to a cardiologist.

name: Skin & Dermatosurgery
description: Skin and Dermatologic surgeons continue to pioneer new research and treatment options. These doctors are very special for them who have skin problem.

name: Dental
description: Abnormal alignment of the teeth and jaws was uncommon before the industrial revolution, and is absent completely in hunter-gatherer societies, as it is a diet of softer foods that causes it.

name: Psychiatry
description: People who specialize in psychiatry often differ from most other mental health professionals and physicians in that they must be familiar with both the social and biological sciences.

name: Surgery
description: Surgery is a medical or dental specialty that uses operative manual and instrumental techniques on a person. to investigate or treat a pathological condition such as a disease or injury.

name: Neurologist
description: Neurology is the branch of medicine concerned with the study and treatment of disorders of medicine concerned with the study and treatment of disorders of the nervous system.
